thread.title: Police: Brothers were beaten, one fatally, in NY church to make them confess their sins
thread.title_full: Police: Brothers were beaten, one fatally, in NY church to make them confess their sins | OregonLive.com

author: Samantha House | shouse@syracuse.com
title: Police: Brothers were beaten, one fatally, in NY church to make them confess their sins
text:
NEW HARTFORD, N.Y. -- Christopher and Lucas Leonard were beaten for hours at a New Hartford church in the hopes of getting them to "confess" to sins and seek forgiveness, police said.
A counseling session was held at the Word of Life Church after services Sunday night for Lucas Leonard, 19, and Christopher Leonard, 17, New Hartford Police Chief Michael Inserra said during a news conference today.
The counseling session eventually turned violent, he said.
The brothers were beaten for hours, with church members using fists and feet to assault them, Inserra said. They were beaten "in the hopes that each would confess to prior sins and ask for forgiveness," Inserra said.
"We have not determined what the punishment was for at this point," he said.
Deborah and Bruce Leonard, the brothers' parents, beat Lucas Leonard, Inserra said. When Lucas Leonard stopped breathing Monday morning, family members took him to the hospital. The teenager died shortly after he arrived.
Christopher Leonard was beaten by Linda Morey, Joseph Irwin, Sarah Ferguson and David Morey, Inserra said. Ferguson is the sister of both victims, he said.
After interviewing family members and realizing the church was the scene of the crime, SWAT teams surrounded and entered the church without incident, Inserra said.
Press conference on New Hartford death The town of New Hartfort police chief Michael Inserra addressed the media on the death of Lucas Leonard at the Word of Life Church,
It took hours to find Christopher Leonard, Inserra said. The teenager eventually left the second floor of the church and was rushed to a hospital, Inserra said, where's he currently in serious condition.
Seven children between the ages of 2 and 15 were removed from the church, Inserra said. The church doubled as residence for some members, including Irwin -- one of the people charged with assaulting Christopher Leonard.
Inserra said investigators determined the duration of the beating and the combination of injuries contributed to Lucas Leonard's death. The cause of death, however, will be determined following an autopsy.
Police found no evidence to support rumors that the brothers were molesting children, Inserra said.
Deborah and Bruce Leonard, ages 59 and 65, have both been charged with first-degree manslaughter. Linda Morey, 54, Irwin, 26, Ferguson, 33, and David Morey, 26, have been have been charged with second-degree assault.
Additional arrests and charges may be pending, Inserra said.
Patrick Lohmann contributed to this report.
